description: {"blocks":[{"key":"eh4f3","text":"In this protocol we describe the differentiation of human induced pluripotent stem cells (hiPSCs) into human midbrain-like organoids (hMLOs). This protocol has been developed based from several published protocols.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
keywords: Midbrain-like Organoids, human induced pluripotent stem cells (hiPSCs), Matrigel embedding

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"3h6jf","text":"Dissociate iPSC colonies to single cells with Accutase for   at  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":59,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":64,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"1e6mh","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":420,"guid":"A85AB5B092AC11ECBF17A12C57E998B4","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"AA30D54092AC11ECBF17A12C57E998B4","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4qpji","text":"Re-suspend cells in day0 medium and plate 8.000 cells/well in 96-Wells Plate U-round-Bottom Low Attachment.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"1f7ru","text":"Carefully exchange the medium, without touching the EBs.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ct2k3","text":"Dilute Matrigel in a 3:2 ratio with day 4 medium (used as an embedding mixture).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cp8aj","text":"Wash EBs in day 4 medium. Transfer and mix 5-8 EBs into the embedding mixture and plate onto a 6-well ultra-low-attachment plate.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8lubq","text":"Add fresh differentiation medium without disrupting the embedded EBs.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"6pftv","text":"After Day 8 change medium twice a week. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9cb1t","text":"Reduce CHIR to  . Remove CHIR from medium at day 15 and onwards.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":15,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8evo7","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"0.7","error_concentration":false,"guid":"833F47D092AE11ECBF17A12C57E998B4","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":29}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2sduq","text":"Manually dissociate organoids from Matrigel, using two surgical needles.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: Midbrain-like Organoids generation from hiPSCs
